department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: John Corba received his B.S. in TV/Radio/Film production from the The Newhouse School, at Syracuse University. He has over 20 years of production experience working in New York, Los Angeles and now Chicago. He is an accomplished Production Designer, Art Director, and Propmaster and has worked in a variety of capacities on feature films, television shows, music videos and countless commercials. More recently, John was a member of the prop department on the hit television shows, "Chicago Fire", "Shameless", and "The Unit" and in set decoration on the shows "Lincoln Heights", "Rizzoli & Isles", "Playboy Club"  and "Boss".
